Record.ClassificationPath: Virus Diseases/RNA Virus Infections/Mononegavirales Infections/Paramyxoviridae Infections/Morbillivirus Infections/Peste-des-Petits-Ruminants
Record.Description: A highly fatal contagious disease of goats and sheep caused by PESTE-DES-PETITS-RUMINANTS VIRUS. The disease may be acute or subacute and is characterized by stomatitis, conjunctivitis, diarrhea, and pneumonia.
